genotype.Name: Mutated Human
genotype.DisplayName: [突然変異\とつぜんへんい]した[人間\にんげん]

stat.Name: Strength
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[筋力\きんりょく]}} score determines how effectively you penetrate your opponents' armor with melee attacks, how much damage your melee attacks do, your ability to resist forced movement, and your carry capacity.

stat.Name: Agility
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[敏捷力\びんしょう力]}} score determines your accuracy with both melee and ranged weapons and your ability to dodge attacks.

stat.Name: Toughness
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[忍耐力\にんたいりょく]}} score determines your number of hit points, your natural healing rate, and your ability to resist poison and disease.

stat.Name: Intelligence
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[知力\ちりょく]}} score determines your number of skill points and your ability to examine artifacts.

stat.Name: Willpower
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[意志力\いしりょく]}} score modifies the cooldowns of your activated abilities, determines your ability to resist mental attacks, and modifies your natural healing rate.

stat.Name: Ego
stat.ChargenDescription: Your {{W|[魅力\みりょく]}} score determines the potency of your mental mutations, your ability to haggle with merchants, and your ability to dominate the wills of other living creatures.
